data.text:
Good location and great lobby but other then that the hotel is terrible we had to change rooms 3 times in 2days as our room had no television channels and no heating at all so had to move, then the second room the air conditioner vent fell half down from the ceiling hitting me on the head, when complained they didnt care in the slightest didnt even apologise for what happened just changed rooms again, the 3rd room is dirty, house keeping just entered our room at 10am whilst we were naked, they cant speak good english and claim they understand yet mention things that have nothing to do with your complaint and their customer relations are terrible.

Dust on a lot of surfaces

house keeping locked us out of out bathroom

WiFi keeps going down

Left over an hour for a room change when it was already gone midnight and i had a operation in the morning

They didnt serve my guest breakfast (omelette )even though she queued up for 10mins and was totally ignored by the lady serving

Only one lift worked on the first and second day

Ordered pizza without pepper and tomato  as my guests allergic to peppers and they still put them on

The 3rd room only came with one key which was needed for the electric  til we re complained and got another

Toilet was not cleaned and kept running water which was extremely loud and frustrating through the nights which again, they didnt care.

We also tried cancelling the remaining days and they said we can leave but wont be refunded

This is NOT A 5star hotel and would not recommend
data.title: Terrible

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Curtis,

Thank you for present your experiences to our attention during your stay at Kaya İzmir Thermal&Convention. High level and permanent guest satisfaction is our priority in the services we offer. 
We would like you to know that, we carefully examine every comment you have made, share them with our departments and take the necessary actions to provide you better services.

We will be delighted to welcome you again in our hotel, and wish you will have a more enjoyable stay with the privilege of Kaya İzmir Thermal&Convention.

Kind Regards,
İsa ERDEM
General Manager
Kaya İzmir Thermal&Convention
owner_response.author: İsa Erdem

data.text:
If I say thank you, my thanks will not be enough for you. If my ink dries up, I will write you a heart with the purity of love that carries humor and the imprint of longing.. The purest, most beautiful, purest, and kindest greetings.
 The reception staff were great, the rooms were very clean and spacious, overlooking the front of the hotel.  The king size beds were excellent.  Air conditioning that I can actually turn on.  The bathroom is equipped with gentle toiletries and soft towels.  Excellent free WiFi in the room and throughout the hotel.  In addition to the other entertainment facilities represented by the swimming pools, steam bath, sauna, and sports games, they are also really excellent, and the restaurants and cafes were excellent, many stores, supermarkets, pharmacies, and other restaurants within walking distance.
data.title: Best Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response

Kind Regards,
İsa ERDEM

Kaya İzmir Thermal&Convention
owner_response.author: İsa Erdem

data.text:
OLD HOTEL IN NEED OF RENOVATION.

The Bedrooms are old fashioned and relatively small.
The Breakfast Restaurant resembles a 2 star train station design, cold and frigid.
Good Front office Services.
Without the Thermal features, this hotel would have closed down a long time ago.
The Breakfast Buffet is very economic with no quality choices, so as to save money. Endless Cheese offers, no Brie, Blue Cheese  or Camembert.
No Ham ( for Non Muslims) and no Salami, but  endless Salad  and Bread Offers,

The Guest Relation Manager, Ms. Breda was outstanding !
data.title: OLD HOTEL.

data.text: Staff hotel location all 5 star just how top hotel should be custermer service lady perfect at her job pool service and treatments all very good value for money separate area for smokers around pool would be good food was excellent bar staff great
data.title: Treatments in turkey

data.text:
The given service quality and the attitude of hotel staffs are extremely satisfactory. In addition, it is very pleasing that Hotel General Manager takes care of you personally.

I would definitely recommend staying at this hotel to those who come to Izmir
data.title: One of the best hotels in the region
